testSuite: AI Intent Recognition - P2+P3 Complete Test Cases

testCases.description: 验证正常签到操作-上午时段

operationVerification.checkSql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM time_clock_records WHERE user_id = 2 AND clock_date = CURDATE() AND clock_in_time IS NOT NULL

operationVerification.checkSql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM time_clock_records WHERE user_id = 7 AND clock_date = CURDATE()

expectedResponse.messagePattern: 已签到|重复签到|已打卡
